column6: p.r.; Calcd. fit to d.k. at 340 nm in Ar-satd. soln. contg. 0.05 mol L$^{-1}$ Cl$^-$ and 0.15 mol L$^{-1}$ HClO4; assumed $G(\ce{Cl2^{.-}})$ = 2.9, $G(\ce{H^.})$ = 3.7, $2k(\ce{Cl2^{.-}} + \ce{Cl2^{.-}})$ = $4 \times 10^9$, $2k(\ce{H^.} + \ce{H^.})$ = $2.2 \times 10^{10}$.
f.p.; Data fitting using condy. data from solutions contg. HCl at pH 2-5 and assumed values for concurrent reactions.
